meanings.definition: In a way that produces good or useful results
meanings.sent1: She worked fruitfully on her project and completed it on time.
meanings.sent2: The farmer's hard work in the fields paid off fruitfully during harvest season.
meanings.sent3: The squirrel fruitfully gathered nuts for the winter, ensuring a cozy season ahead.
meanings.sent4: Her dedication to learning new skills bore fruitfully as she aced the exam.
meanings.sent5: The seeds planted in the fertile soil grew fruitfully into beautiful flowers.

meanings.definition: In a way that is productive or beneficial
meanings.sent1: The team collaborated fruitfully to achieve their common goal.
meanings.sent2: By managing his time fruitfully, he was able to accomplish all his tasks.
meanings.sent3: The chef fruitfully experimented with new ingredients, creating a unique dish.
meanings.sent4: Her positive attitude at work spread fruitfully among her colleagues.
meanings.sent5: The student's efforts to understand the topic paid off fruitfully during the exam.
